ProofLine.FormulaLine.Description: This formula is not proved yet. It just serves as a hint for what you need to prove on (or before) this line.

DeductionMethod.BySubstitution.LongDescr: The formula on this line is obtained by substituting {{atomicFormula}} with ${{replacement}}$ in ({{formulaIndex}})
